    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup(int xMax,
         int yMax,
         int numLinesX,
         int numLinesY,
         android.graphics.Bitmap robotIcon)
        Call this to setup the MapView and draw the grid
        Parameters:
        xMax - The max positive width, in mm. Note that this is doubled to give the overall width.
        yMax - The max positive height, in mm. Note that this is doubled to give the overall height.
        numLinesX - The number of grid lines to be drawn horizontally
        numLinesY - The number of grid lines to be drawn vertically

      • setRobotLocation

        public void setRobotLocation(int x,
                    int y,
                    int angle)
        Set the location of the robot
        Parameters:
        x - The +- mm location horizontally
        y - The +- mm location vertically
        angle - The angle of the robot, CCW

      • addMarker

        public int addMarker(int x,
            int y,
            int color)
        Add a marker, represented as a sphere
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate, in +-mm
        y - The y coordinate, in +-mm
        color - The color value (eg Color.RED).
        Returns:
        The integer id of this circle, which can be passed to `removeMarker`

      • removeMarker

        public boolean removeMarker(int id)
        Removes a marker
        Parameters:
        id - The marker's id
        Returns:
        True if successful, false otherwise

      • addDrawable

        public int addDrawable(int x,
              int y,
              int resource)
        Adds a drawable resource to the map
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of resource, in +-mm
        y - Y coordinate of resource, in +-mm
        resource - The int id of theint drawable resource
        Returns:
        The internal id, used to remove the resource

      • redraw

        public void redraw()
